name: @hbuesing/ui-library
description: Collection of reusable ui components for react based applications

scripts.build: microbundle build --output ./dist/bundle.js --generateTypes true --format modern --jsx react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsxRuntime --css inline
scripts.build:uil: microbundle build --output ../website/src/uil-bundle/bundle.js --generateTypes true --format modern --jsx react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsxRuntime --css inline
scripts.dev: microbundle -w --output ./dist/bundle.js --generateTypes true --format modern --jsx react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsxRuntime --css inline
